thread.title: DoYourData Offers Free Data Recovery Software for Windows and Mac Data Recovery
thread.title_full: DoYourData Offers Free Data Recovery Software for Windows and Mac Data Recovery

author: prbuzz.com
title: DoYourData Offers Free Data Recovery Software for Windows and Mac Data Recovery
text:
DoYourData Software, the leading data recovery software providers releases free data recovery software – Do Your Data Recovery Free 4.0 for both Windows users and Mac users to recover lost data. DoYourData has made data recovery effective, easy and free, saving time and money for common users. The release of Do Your Data Recovery Free gives Windows and Mac user a good chance of recovering lost data when disaster comes.
Do Your Data Recovery Free is a complete free data recovery tool that allows users to recover up to 1 GB lost files. It is full featured that can recover deleted, formatted or inaccessible data from hard drive, digital device and storage media. Compared with other data recovery software, Do Your Data Recovery Free is more powerful yet more easy-to-use. “We want to make it an all-around data recovery tool, can recover everything from any kind of device.” The product manager tells, “It works for any kind of data loss disaster. As you see, it is so easy to use, even the most inexperienced user can handle it with ease.”
It supports all the popular Windows and Mac versions, including Windows 10 and OS X 10.11 EI Capitan. If you are looking for a solution for recovering files under Windows 10 or OS X 10.11, Do Your Data Recovery Free 4.0 is a good choice.
Availability:
Do Your Data Recovery Free 4.0 (Windows version) available at: http://www.doyourdata.com/data-recovery-software/free-data-recovery-software.html
Do Your Data Recovery Free 4.0 (Mac version) available at: http://www.doyourdata.com/mac-data-recovery-software/free-mac-data-recovery-software.html
About DoYourData Software:
DoYourData Software is a professional software developer which is dedicated to providing complete and safe data recovery solution for individuals, enterprises and business users worldwide. It supplies global users with excellent data recovery software under Windows & Mac OS X, and also provides effective data recovery programs for iPhone data recovery, iPad recovery, storage media recovery. To get more information, please visit www.doyourdata.com
